welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Blundellsands, a charming seaside town known for its beautiful beaches and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer and make unforgettable memories. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Charter Terminal
terminals.description: The charter terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport serves seasonal flights to popular vacation destinations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
